description: The round payoff this round was 2. You, Kate chose to play option 2.John chose to play option 2. You received a payoff of -2000.
John can retaliate by choosing option 2 if Kate does, leading to mutual severe penalties
Mutual defection (both choosing option 2) is highly detrimental due to the 1000x multiplier, making cooperation (both choosing 1) safer
John’s model adapts beyond its default action (option 1) when anticipating Kate’s choices, implying strategic awareness
Choosing option 2 risks triggering a retaliatory spiral, making consistent cooperation (option 1) strategically preferable to avoid catastrophic losses
